data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ermilov, Sergey G., Anichkin, Alexander E., Wu, Donghui (2012): Two new species of the genus Papillacarus (Acari: Oribatida: Lohmanniidae) from caves of Southern Vietnam. Zootaxa 3593: 75-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209735
